title: [$50 1v1] NSP New Years 2019
body:
Hey all,
My Discord Server the No Sleep Palace is hosting a $50 prize pool (FREE TO ENTER) 1v1 open to all ranks!! Here are the details:
* - 31st of December @ 8:00 PM AEDT.
* - $50 RP Prize Pool.
* - Sign Ups in the Battlefy Link.
* - Double Elimination.
* - Open Rank.*
You MUST be in the Discord to enter the tournament for communication purposes.
Thank you all!
~ Zach, Co-Owner of NSP.

https://discord.gg/weQZCaT
https://battlefy.com/no-sleep-palace-tournaments/%5Bnsp%5D-ultimate-1v1-new-years-2019/5e0072253f36d84961654067/participants

replies.body: Is are you streaming the 1 v 1 battles? Hence the need for discord?
